Header: 111 Brigade Troops Fight Fire & Extinguish it in Gampola
Content: Troops of the 111 Brigade, 10 Gajaba Regiment, 2 (Volunteer) Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) troops and officials in the Disaster Management Training School in Gampola on Friday (31) rushed to extinguish a sudden fire that erupted in a store at Gampola Savarasavigama. 6 Officers and 100 plus troops of the 111 Brigade under the 11 Division of the Security Force HQ-Central with the assistance of the villagers brought the spreading fire under control after much difficulty, together with fire-fighters.
